activities.name: Independence Hall
activities.description: Explore the site of the signing of the Declaration of Independence.

activities.name: Andy Warhol Museum
activities.description: A museum dedicated to the works of Andy Warhol.

itinerary.notes: Check out the local food scene.

activities.name: Millennium Park
activities.description: Visit the famous park and see the Cloud Gate sculpture.

activities.name: Art Institute of Chicago
activities.description: One of the oldest and largest art museums in the United States.
